name: Sinner (Aonekorigin)
description:
How much of a sinner are you?

INFO:

Game based on Wrath, Greed, Sloth.

Controls:

AWSD- moving

Arrows- shooting

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

SPOILER///READ ONLY IF YOU GET STUCK

There are hidden corridors in the start room.

You can destroy mostly everything.

Enemies wont follow you if you get out of their room.

Depending on the way you play you will get more or less points on each sin.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

Music by Xavier Ulacia

Art by Javier Vivancos

Programming by Jorge Cásedas

Game Design by Eaten Dreams
